President Bush at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the U.N. two days later. Donald Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. Once that's removed, Allen Iverson is going to look to rehabilitate his leg because the doctors tell him he'll be out four to six weeks. He's hoping to be able to play in the playoffs. Earlier on Wednesday, reports from several media outlets including Fox News and NBA.com reported that Allen Iverson may be looking to retire due to the injury, after receiving information from HoopsWorld regarding his status.

''In this hydraulic hybrid project, the Chrysler Group and EPA will evaluate and, hopefully, validate fuel-efficiency gains and greenhouse gas reductions,'' Sergio Marchionne said. One of the aims of Chrysler Group's integration efforts will be to meet driver expectations for smooth and quiet operation, so that Americans will want to buy and will enjoy driving vehicles with this technology.
